proposals.title: Forecast Rice Export Value to Bangladesh Using Historical Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Predict the 2024-25 INR value of rice exports to Bangladesh using historical quantity and value data from 2018-2023. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

join_plan.notes: Single-dataset task using temporal features from the same table

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop rows with missing target values (25% nulls in 2024-25 Value column)

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2018-2022) and 20% testing (2023-2024)
quality_checks: Validate residuals show no temporal patterns

proposals.title: Predict Crop Production Trends Using Area and Yield Historical Data
proposals.problem_statement: Forecast future crop production values using historical area under cultivation and yield per unit area data across seasons. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

join_plan.notes: Natural primary key combination for crop-season specific records

transform_ideas: Create rolling averages of area and yield across seasons
Calculate year-over-year percentage changes in area and yield
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill seasonal patterns with crop-specific averages

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation using 2018-21 data for training and 2022-24 for testing
quality_checks: Mean absolute error < 15% of average production

proposals.title: Predict Future Crop Yields Using Historical Yield Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Forecast annual crop yields (tons per hectare) using multi-year historical yield data across seasons. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness with 2020-2024 yield metrics having 0% missing values. Focus on INR-based production economics.

join_plan.notes: No external joins required - single dataset analysis using temporal features

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill for pre-2020 gaps, exclude 2023-24 rows with missing target (2.5% of data)

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2020-2023) and 20% testing (2024) splits
quality_checks: Verify yield trends align with production/area ratios
